name: Moodlings
description:
Moodlings is a game about you, and dozens of creatures called Moodlings. The goal of the game is to survive a 7 day work week at a ranch, where Moodlings sprout up from the ground. You will need to make sure Moodlings  (Sicklings)  that turn sick &  Moodlings (Murderlings) that turn evil don't disrupt your daily Moodling quota. Otherwise you will get fired. You also have to make sure you don't die on the job...

The game was a solo project for the Brackeys 2022.2 Game Jam. Please play the game in full screen so you get the most accurate view of the games graphics.

Instructions

-WASD to move

-Left mouse click to fire Pacifier(gun)

-Right mouse click to use Cleanser

-G key to use grenade

Tips (Read only if you find the game hard)

-Positioning is the most important tool in your arsenal. Search for areas where there aren't many Moodlings so you can have a clear shot in quickly culling Muderlings and Sicklings. Moodlings are also quite small. By constantly being on the move you should get numerous lines of sights to your targets.

-Don't be afraid to sacrifice Moodlings. If a single Moodling is blocking your line of sight killing them is a small price to be ready for the next changling. Also having too many Moodlings can be an issue if sickness starts to spread. Try to balance out your Moodlings to your near day quotas.

-Use grenades on Murderlings due to their 2 hit health. By throwing a grenade at a Murderling and then firing at them you will most likely kill them (and their target) very quickly. This is especially efficient due to their standing cooldown after an attack.

-Use the Cleanser when it seems you're about to have a sickling outbreak. Be careful with timing as the cooldown is long. The Cleanser can also be used as a predictive measure whilst you go after other types of Moodlings in later days.
